directions: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, blend heavy cream, mango juice, brandy, and brown sugar until thickened. Stir in mangoes, and bring to a boil over high heat. Continue to cook and stir about 1 minute. Serve warm.
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can mango slices, with juice
title: Mango Cream Sauce
